price: 71 « Nous adorons, dirent-ils, des idoles auxquelles nous vouons un culte assidu. »
arabic: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ أَصۡنَامٗا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qālū naʿbudu aṣnāman fanaẓallu lahā ʿākifīna
